channel.title: PORTFOLIO on Luiz F. Manke
channel.description: Recent content in PORTFOLIO on Luiz F. Manke

item.title: Customer Analytics
item.description: To ensure high profit in marketing campaigns is important to know who’s the customers that are more likely to buy your product. For that, this project uses predictive analytics and market segmentation to predict customers behaviors.

item.title: Employee Attrition
item.description: Predictive analytics and clustering analysis is used to understand the main causes of employee attrition in order to save time and money when searching and training new people.
